불가사리 is 70 feet long and 50 feet tall, and it weighs about 130 tons.

불가사리 cannot 말하기.

전투

COMBAT

불가사리 공격 with its claws, teeth, horns, and tail.

불가사리’s natural 무기 are treated as 에픽 무기 for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Augmented Critical (Ex): 불가사리’s bite threatens a critical hit on a natural 명중 굴림 of 18–20, dealing triple 피해 on a successful critical hit.

끔찍한 존재(Su): 불가사리 can inspire terror by charging or attacking. Affected creatures must succeed on a DC 36 Will save or become shaken, remaining in that condition as long as they remain with 60 feet of 불가사리. The save DC is 매력-based.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, 불가사리 must hit a Huge or smaller opponent with its bite 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. If it wins 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and can try to swallow the foe the following round.

Rush (Ex): Once per minute, the normally 감속화-moving 불가사리 can 이동 at a 속도 of 150 feet.

Swallow Whole (Ex): 불가사리 can try to swallow a grabbed opponent of Huge or smaller size by making a successful 드잡이 check. Once inside, the opponent takes 2d8+8 points of crushing 피해 plus 2d8+6 points of acid 피해 per round from 불가사리’s digestive juices. A swallowed creature can cut its way out by dealing 50 points of 피해 to 불가사리’s digestive tract (AC 25). Once the creature exits, muscular action closes the hole; another swallowed opponent must cut its own way out. 불가사리’s gullet can hold 2 Huge, 8 Large, 32 Medium, 128 Small, or 512 Tiny or smaller creatures.

Carapace (Ex): 불가사리’s armorlike carapace is exceptionally tough and highly reflective, deflecting all 광선, lines, cones, and even magic missile 주문. There is a 30% chance of reflecting any such effect back at the caster; otherwise, it is merely negated. Check for reflection before rolling to overcome the creature’s 주문 저항.

재생(Ex): No form of 공격 deals lethal 피해 to 불가사리. 불가사리 재생 even if it fails a 내성 굴림 against a 분해 spell or a death effect. If 불가사리 fails its save against a spell or effect that would kill it instantly (such as those mentioned above), the spell or effect instead deals 비치명적인 피해 equal to the creature’s full normal 히트 포인트 +10 (or 868 hp). The 불가사리 is immune to effects that produce incurable or bleeding wounds, such as 미라 rot, a sword with the wounding special ability, or a 진흙 골렘’s cursed wound ability.

불가사리 can be slain only by raising its 비치명적인 피해 total to its full normal 히트 포인트 +10 (or 868 히트 포인트) and using a 소원 or 기적 spell to keep it 죽음.

If 불가사리 loses a limb or body part, the lost portion regrows in 1d6 minutes (the detached piece dies and decays normally). The creature can reattach the severed member instantly by holding it to the stump.

스킬: 불가사리 has a +8 racial 보너스 on 듣기 and 감지 checks.

A 텐드리쿨로스 can rear up to a height of 15 feet. It weighs about 3,500 pounds.

Animals and other plant creatures are unnerved by the presence of a 텐드리쿨로스; they avoid it and any place it has been within the last 24 hours.

전투

COMBAT

Prowling deep forests or waiting in vegetated 범위(looking like nothing more than a small hillock), a 텐드리쿨로스 공격 savagely, showing no 공포. It attempts to swallow as much flesh as it can, as quickly as it can.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 텐드리쿨로스 must hit a creature at least one size smaller than itself with its bite 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. If it wins 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and can try to swallow the opponent in the following round. A 텐드리쿨로스 can also use its improved grab ability on a tendril 공격. If it wins the 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold, picks up the opponent, and transfers it to the mouth as a free action, automatically dealing bite 피해.

Swallow Whole/마비(Ex): A 텐드리쿨로스 can try to swallow a grabbed opponent by making a successful 드잡이 check. Once inside the plant’s 광역, the opponent must succeed on a DC 20 Fortitude save or be paralyzed for 3d6 rounds by the 텐드리쿨로스’s digestive juices, taking 2d6 points of acid 피해 per round. A new save is required each round inside the plant. The save DC is 건강-based. A swallowed creature that avoids 마비 can 등반 out of 광역 with a successful 드잡이 check. This returns it to the plant’s maw, where another successful 드잡이 check is needed to get free. A swallowed creature can also cut its way out by using a 빛 slashing or piercing weapon to deal 25 points of 피해 to 텐드리쿨로스’s interior (AC 14). Once the creature exits, the plant’s regenerative capacity closes the hole; another swallowed opponent must cut its own way out. A Huge 텐드리쿨로스’s interior can hold 2 Large, 8 Medium, 32 Small, 128 Tiny, or 512 Diminutive or smaller opponents.

재생(Ex): Bludgeoning 무기 and acid deal normal 피해 to a 텐드리쿨로스. A 텐드리쿨로스 that loses part of its body 광역 can regrow it in 1d6 minutes. Holding the severed portion against 광역 enables it to reattach instantly.

When a 타쿠아 is disturbed, its first instinct is to 공격. Its favored tactic is to spring directly at a foe, either by bursting out of the rock or by coiling up its body and launching itself like a spring. (Treat this as a 돌격, even though 타쿠아 does not need to 이동 10 feet before attacking.)

타이탄 말하기 Abyssal, Common, Celestial, 용언, and 거인.

전투

COMBAT

A 타이탄’s natural 무기, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as chaotic-aligned for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

In addition, 타이탄 of good or neutral 성향 can use the following additional spell-like 능력: At will—햇살, 성스러운 주벌 (DC 21), 저주 제거 (DC 21); 1/일—상급 복원. 시전자 레벨 20th. The save DCs are 매력-based.

타이탄 of evil 성향 can use the following additional spell-like 능력: At will—저주 부여 (DC 21), 깊은 암흑, 부정의 마름병 (DC 21); 1/일—짓누르는 손 (DC 26). 시전자 레벨 20th. The save DCs are 매력-based.

각 라운드별 전술

TACTICS ROUND-BY-ROUND

타이탄 enjoy 전투 and usually close with their foes. If that proves ineffective, they swiftly back off and pelt the foe with spell-like 능력 and magical effects. Because of a 타이탄’s 빠른 유사주문 능력 feat, it can use 사슬 번개 as a free action, and frequently 공격 in melee while lashing out with this ability at the same time.

Prior to 전투: 투명상태 정화 or 투명화.

Round 1: 돌격 and attempt to 무기 파괴 the weapon of the most dangerous foe. Hurl 사슬 번개 at opponents standing away from the fight.

Round 2: 전력 공격 against the disarmed opponent, and hurl 사슬 번개 at other opponents.

Round 3: Back away from first opponent and use 미로 or 유성우 on any spellcaster causing trouble.

Round 4: 무기 파괴 the weapon of the next most effective combatant, or use 상급 마법 무효화 on all nearby opponents.

Round 5: 전력 공격 against any nearby opponent, or use 화염 폭품.

Use another quickened 사슬 번개 if foes seem really dangerous.

A 타이탄 usually reserves its 관문 and 에테리얼화 능력 to escape a fight that is not going well.

A 토자니다’s shell is 파랑이-green in color. Inside the shell is a fleshy body from which extend seven stalks. Four of these stalks have paddles for locomotion, two are tipped with claws, and one bears the creature’s head. Eight vents in the shell, four at each end, allow 토자니다 to thrust its stalks out in whatever configuration it finds convenient.

A juvenile 토자니다 is up to 25 years old. It has a shell about 3 feet long, and it weighs about 60 pounds. An adult is aged 26 to 80. Its shell is about 6 feet long, and it weighs about 220 pounds. An elder can reach 150 years of 나이. It has a shell about 9 feet long, and it weighs about 500 pounds.

토자니다 말하기 Aquan and can be loquacious, but usually only on the subject of food.

전투

COMBAT

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 토자니다 must hit with a bite or claw 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. Underwater, a 토자니다 can tow a grabbed victim of its own size or smaller at its 수영 속도(but it cannot 달리기). A favorite tactic is to grab a single opponent, then 퇴각, hauling the opponent away from its allies.

Ink Cloud (Ex): A 토자니다 can emit a spherical cloud of jet-black ink with a radius of 30 feet once per minute as a free action. The effect is otherwise similar to 안개 구름 cast by an individual of a 레벨 equal to 토자니다’s 히트 다이스. Out of water, the ink emerges in a stream up to 30 feet long, which a 토자니다 can squirt into an opponent’s eyes. The affected creature must succeed on a Reflex save or be blinded for 1 round. The save DC is 13 against a juvenile, 15 against an adult, and 21 against an elder. The save DCs are 건강 based.

All-Around 시야(Ex): The multiple apertures in a 토자니다’s shell allow it to look in any direction, bestowing a +4 racial 보너스 on 감지 and 탐색 checks. Opponents gain no 협공 보너스 when attacking a 토자니다.

스킬: A 토자니다 has a +8 racial 보너스 on any 수영 check to 공연 some special action or avoid a hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a 수영 check, even if distracted or endangered. It can use 달리기 action while swimming, provided it 수영 in a straight line.

Like 리치, they often embrace finery and decadence and may assume the guise of nobility. Despite their human appearance, 뱀파이어 can be easily recognized, for they cast no 어둠 and throw no reflections in mirrors.

뱀파이어의 약점

Vampire Weaknesses

For all their power, 뱀파이어 have a number of weaknesses.

Repelling a 뱀파이어: 뱀파이어 cannot tolerate the strong odor of garlic and will not enter an 범위 laced with it. Similarly, they recoil from a mirror or a strongly presented holy symbol. These things don’t 해악 뱀파이어—they merely keep it at bay. A recoiling 뱀파이어 must stay at least 5 feet away from a creature holding the mirror or holy symbol and cannot touch or make melee 공격 against the creature holding the item for the rest of the encounter. Holding a 뱀파이어 at bay takes a standard action.

뱀파이어 are also unable to cross running water, although they can be carried over it while resting in their coffins or aboard a ship.

They are utterly unable to enter a home or other building unless invited in by someone with the authority to do so. They may freely enter public places, since these are by definition open to all.

Slaying a 뱀파이어: Reducing a 뱀파이어’s 히트 포인트 to 0 or lower incapacitates it but doesn’t always destroy it (see the note on 빠른 치료). However, certain 공격 can slay 뱀파이어. Exposing any 뱀파이어 to direct sunlight disorients it: It can take only a single 이동 action or 공격 action and is destroyed utterly in the next round if it cannot escape. Similarly, immersing a 뱀파이어 in running water robs it of one-third of its 히트 포인트 each round until it is destroyed at the end of the third round of immersion. Driving a wooden stake through a 뱀파이어’s heart instantly slays the monster. However, it returns to life if the stake is removed, unless the body is destroyed. A popular tactic is to cut off the creature’s head and fill its mouth with holy wafers (or their equivalent).
